name: large & grand 2 bedroom South End by Copley Sq #3
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the South End of Boston just by Copley Square. The South End is known as the area of Boston with the best restaurants,  galleries and cafes.
description:
The available apartment (#3 1st floor) consists of the grand parlor level of this 1860 townhouse.
This large 2 bedroom one bathroom apartment was renovated June 2012 and features all newer furnishings.

The rental must be for 28 days or longer. This is a city of Boston regulation

The space
The available apartment (#3 1st floor) consists of the grand parlor level of this 1860 townhouse.

This large 2 bedroom one bathroom apartment was renovated June 2012 and features all new furnishings. In one of the bedrooms is found a king size bed. The 2nd bedroom has a queen size bed.

The living dining area features a queen size sofa/bed, desk and dining table for up to 8 people.

A twin size blow up mattress can be provided. I also have available a Porta Crib.

In the living room is a television, stereo, and phone. the phone service allows local calls. The apartment also features air conditioning, wireless intern
